cards.title: Pecos Bill
powers: {PecosBill} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage. a [u]folk[/u] target deals 1 target 1 melee damage. you may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
Select a Hero. The next time that Hero uses a Power, that Hero also deals 1 Target 1 Melee Damage.

openingLines.default: hoo-wee! We got ourselves some wrastlin' to do, folks.

cards.title: Big Colt .45
body: When this card is destroyed, {PecosBill} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage.

cards.title: Big Man on the Scene
body: When this card is played, each hero target regains 1 hp.
powers: {PecosBill} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If a target is destroyed this way, {PecosBill} deals 1 target 2 irreducible psychic damage. If no damage is dealt this way, play a card.

cards.title: Coyote Raised
body: when this card is played, you may draw a card.
increase damage dealt by {PecosBill} by 1.
powers: {PecosBill} deals up to 3 targets 1 melee damage each.

cards.title: Dun' Get Twisted
body: Play this card next to [i]Tamed Twister[/i]. If [i]Tamed Twister[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When a villain target would be moved to the trash, move it to the bottom of the villain deck instead.

cards.title: Go Down Fightin'
body: You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.
For each of your [i]folk[/i] cards in play, a hero may use a power.
You may draw a card.

cards.title: Just You 'n' Me, Pardner
body: You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.
Destroy all your [u]hyperbole[/u] cards, then all your [u]folk[/u] cards. {PecosBill} regains X HP, then deals 1 target X melee damage, where X = the number of cards destroyed this way times 2.

cards.title: Loyal Lightning
body: at the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals 1 target 1 lightning damage.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy all [u]hyperbole[/u] cards next to it instead and restore it to 5 HP. Otherwise, {PecosBill} deals himself 2 psychic damage, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Not 'Round Me You Don't
body: When a non-hero target enters play, {PecosBill} may deal that target 1 melee damage.
powers: Until the start of your next turn, when a hero target would be dealt damage you may redirect it to a target in this play area.

cards.title: Ready to 'Rassel
body: You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.

Select a target. {PecosBill} deals that target 2 melee damage. [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals that target 2 lightning damage. [i]Shake the Snake[/i] deals that target 2 toxic damage. [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals that target 2 projectile damage.

cards.title: Rustlin'
body: Play this card next to [i]Loyal Lightning[/i]. If [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Reduce damage dealt to [u]folk[/u] cards by 1.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: Reveal the top card of a deck. Replace or discard it.

cards.title: Shake 'em Up
body: Play this card next to [i]Shake the Snake[/i]. If [i]Shake the Snake[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When exactly 1 damage would be dealt by a villain target, redirect that damage to that target.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: Until the end of the turn, increase damage dealt by 1.

cards.title: Shake the Snake
body: at the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw 2 cards.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy all [u]hyperbole[/u] cards next to it instead and restore it to 5 HP. Otherwise, {PecosBill} deals himself 2 psychic damage, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Tall Tale Justice
body: If there are no [u]folk[/u] cards in play, you may move one from your hand or trash into play.

If there are no playable [u]hyperbole[/u] cards in your hand, search your trash and deck for a [u]hyperbole[/u] card and put it in your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. You may play a [u]hyperbole[/u] card.
You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.

cards.title: Tamed Twister
body: at the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, play a card.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy all [u]hyperbole[/u] cards next to it instead and restore it to 5 HP. Otherwise, {PecosBill} deals himself 2 psychic damage, then destroy this card.

cards.title: Twist(er) of Fate
body: Play this card next to [i]Tamed Twister[/i]. If [i]Tamed Twister[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When a target other than [i]Tamed Twister[/i] in this play area deals damage to a target, [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals that target 1 projectile damage.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage.

cards.title: Unraveled Shake
body: Play this card next to [i]Shake the Snake[/i]. If [i]Shake the Snake[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When damage dealt by a target in this play area destroys a target, draw a card.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy an ongoing card. The villain target with the highest HP deals [i]Shake the Snake[/i] 3 melee damage.

cards.title: Widow-Maker
body: Play this card next to [i]Loyal Lightning[/i]. If [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When damage would be dealt by {PecosBill} but is prevented or reduced so {PecosBill} deals no damage, [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals that target 1 irreducible lightning damage.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals 1 target 1 irreducible lightning damage.
